parts.text:
SLURM

```json
{
  "application": "SLURM",
  "description": "This script uses SLURM to manage the execution of a benchmark. It requests one node, eight tasks per node, 16 CPUs per task, no memory limit, and eight GPUs. The script uses singularity to run a specific container image and utilizes MPI to run the benchmark across multiple processes.",
  "software_requirements": [
    "SLURM",
    "Singularity",
    "MPI",
    "ROCm-5.4.3"
  ],
  "resource_requirements": {
    "nodes": 1,
    "tasks_per_node": 8,
    "cpus_per_task": 16,
    "memory": 0,
    "gpus": 8
  },
  "container_image": "/shared/apps/bin/grid_0.8.2-20211213.sif",
  "benchmark_script": "/benchmark/gpu_bind.sh",
  "benchmark_name": "Benchmark_ITT"
}
```
